subject: Speed Skating
Ice Skating
lead_paragraph: Heather Richardson and Shani Davis won their first sprint national titles Tuesday, the final day of the United States Long Track Speedskating National Championships. Richardson repeated Monday’s sweep in the 500- and 1,000-meter races in West Allis, Wis. Davis swept the 1,000 and was second in the 500 both days.
